name: Hypoxia Demo
description:
Hi, this is the download page for the Hypoxia Demo.

Hypoxia is a text-based game that takes place inside the mind of someone who has overdosed on heroin, "You."

Explore the inner depths of your mind, find what drove you to overdose, and figure out more about who You are.

Thank you Rafaella Di Cesaro for the cover art!
